content.detailedDescription: I was outdoors at the skateboard park with my son. there were about 20 peoplepresent. i looked into the nne sky to see the airplanes approachibg ohare.Thiswas about 3:15 pm on sunday. i noticed a bright stationary light nne about 35degrees. it appeared to br flashing or reflecting sunlight. i called this to theattention of all present.We observed this object hover for about 20 minutes. itseemed to get dimmer or  move very very slowly to the east over lakemichigan.The wind was blowing to the se. we observed several airplanes go infront of the object from our perspective. a youngster had a video camera. hezoomed in on it and noted it seemed to be a halo shape with a bright lightemminating from the top and bottem. much like a gyroscope. as the airplanesmoved away, this object remained hovering. it made no sound.
content.summary: Silvery stationay object seen in daylight
Spring of 64? bklyn,ny clear visual of object

content.detailedDescription: I was at the park in bridgton, maine. and me and my friend spyro were having aconversation. we were facing each other when i saw something flying across thesky over his head. at first i thought it was a shooting star but then i thoughtto myself that it was way too bright to be one and the fact that it fadded inand out twice. ok, so there i was talking to spyro when suddenly this lightappears in the sky. it looked like a giant fireball about the size of an asprin.It was going what mustve been a 1000 miles an  hour cause planes done move thatfast when there that far away and they go 600. this thing was moving about aninch a second. almost as soon as i saw it i told spyro to look behind him. butthen when he look it kinda sped up and faded away. it was flying in an archuntil it just dissapeared. it all took place for about 20 seconds. after that meand spyro were like, oh my god we just saw a ufo!
content.summary: I saw a silvery white sphere with my friend spryo
Large ball white light moving swiftly east/west lo

content.detailedDescription: this is not the first sighting. we have seen itoff and on for the past two months approximately.  it is mid evening and themoon is bright and the sky is clear. the object is in the same place...High inthe eastern sky. this is an island in the ocean so it may be over water. withour binoculars we can see definitely the green and then red flickering. theobject is stationary but thered and green lights and in a sequence of some sort.The red light is much brighter than the green.
content.summary: Flashing red and green star like entity

content.detailedDescription: I was enroute to my fathers house at 7 pm. it was already dark. i turned offthe main highway onto a rural road and at once noticed blue, revolving policelights in my rearview mirrow. thinking that i must have made a trafficviolation, i pulled over, stopped and looked rearward. i saw nothing, no policecar,nothing. i then looked west to my right and saw an immense object justsitting there at less than 200 ft. above ground level. it was well illuminatedand i got the impression they wanted me to see it. i took one long look and leftthe scene. i looked back and it was gone. i have never told this to many peopleknowing that i would not be believed. i know this sounds absurd, butthis reallyhappened to me. i have no evidence to support this at all, but i will neverforget it. i was never really scared, just apprehensive. it was so close, that icould have hit it with a rock.
content.summary: Close encounter

content.detailedDescription: 15 years ago at least when i was a kid i was getting ready to go on my paperroute. it was clear i could see the moon and what looked like 3 bright stars,one on the right, left, and one on the bottom. so as i was looking one movedthen the second and then the 3rd. started slow and then incredable fast speed in3 seperate directions they dissapeared. please believe this statement!
content.summary: 3 bright objects at 3 different locations near moo
Saw orange/yellow sliver fly at a 30 degree angle

content.detailedDescription: I was in tiffin ohio sitting in the car waiting for my girlfriend to finishshopping.I looked to the west sky and there were 3 orange balls of fire withtails.They were steadily coming down. one coming from the north and 2 comingfrom the west.I didn,t see where they landed.The cloulds got in the way.Pleasecontact me if you have any info.
content.summary: Strange lights tiffin

content.detailedDescription: walking home,  people in street asked me if i knewwhat it was?  they were looking up.   i  said nothing  and looked.   it did notmove.  blue light likeflame, pulsating, never moving for almost an hour.  a fewtimes it dimed to nothing and came back again.  a few times it flickered like aflourscense light.  it was below the clouds and a southern star was visible
content.summary: Bright,blue,glowing, light high in sky,  pulsating

content.detailedDescription: This is in relation to a couple of odd markings that have been consistentlyappearing on my inner left, upper arm.  this has been going on for a year or so. the marks are about the size of the head of a pin, with the middle a solid markand an outer ring of a lighter color.  there are always 2 of them about 1/4 inchapart, always the same place - happens about once a month.  the only other thingi can add to this is recalling a tall, darkly hooded and robed figure leaningover me once.  also, a few weeks ago i dreampt that there was a trap door in thefloor by my bed, and something was coming through it.  i have seen green globesof light floating through my living room on one occasion at night.  i saw thehooded robed figures before, when i was 17, only there were several of them atthat time.  at that time in my life several odd phenomenon also existed.  iwould welcome speaking to someone about these things.
content.summary: Odd marks on my body repeatedly appearing

content.detailedDescription: "here is my observation, taken directly from my notes made at the time of theobservation.  08-14-01 1508 edst  observed a bright elliptical object travellingin a n.E. to s.W. direction above the upper level clouds at a high rate ofspeed.  elevation from my viewpoint was about 60 degrees above the horizon(almost directly overhead) thru 40 degrees.  at the 40 degree elevation theobject came to a dead stop and then turned due south and accelerated out ofsight.  total timed movement of the object thru about 20 degrees was about 3seconds, however, i didnt time the course change of the object and can onlyestimate about 2 seconds before losing visual contact.  note:  no contrail orglow was observed.  a commercial twin engined jet west bound just moments beforemy observation gave me a relative comparison to the objects size, that beingslightly smaller than the aircraft. location of observation: approximately 4miles west of the city of battle creek, on m89 near 1 mile road.  estimatedaltitude: about 35,000 to 45,000 feet (higher than the commercial jet).  that isall i have from my notes.  not sure if object was a meteor or falling debris. just struck me as curious that there was no characteristic trail like a meteorwould have."
content.summary: High altitude elliptical object seen in battle cre

content.detailedDescription: heard loud noise coming toward apartment. my twosons and i went out on the patio and observed a large orange oval shaped ufo itwas heading in a straight flight path and climbed rapidly heading southwest at ahigh rate of speed. it was bigger than a 747 and faster than anything i haveseen flying. i am a chemist and pilot.
content.summary: Large orange object flew over apt and headed south

content.detailedDescription: Okay. i was reading a book, looked out the window and there was this weirdlighti grabbed my camera, raced outside and took some photosthis blue light wasflying eraticly around the skythen another one joined itand two yellow onestoothey made some wierd formations and spiralsone yellow one flew over my headand dissapearedthe others vanished, accept the original, which lingered for abit, then sped over my head itn the direction of the firsti got a few photos onmy digital camera, but not of the formationsi have them on my computer, and ifyou email me i will send them to you.
content.summary: I saw some lights moving in formation.

content.detailedDescription: i was leaving the sams parking lot @ mesa st.Near doniphan in el paso. in my convertible with the top down--i saw in the westsky toward the upper valley an object sort of like a bucket or cylinder(vertical) hanging in the sky and it glowed and appeared to have flames from thetop, i thought it might be a meteor or space junk. called my daughter oncellphone, and she went outside my house, about 5 miles away on the mountain,and she observed it moving from side to side.  i lost sight of it when i turnedeast to drive home.  my daughter quit watching it when she got bored--when iarrived home about 10 minutes later, it was gone.
content.summary: Saw a bucket-like object with apparent flames in s
2 bright lights in sky, each made up of 2 revolvin

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my home in montclair, nj at about 6pm when i heard planes goingoverhead and i looked up to see the planes considering this last week92s event in nyc.    my home is about 13 miles from nyc. the sky was clear withno clouds.  i noticed a small metallic teardrop shaped object just sitting inone place.  i thought the object might be a planet or a weather balloon(considering the shape especially).  i pointed it out to my neighbor and he gothis binoculars.  i focused the binoculars on the object for about  30 seconds. i saw a faint flash and the object was gone.  i asked my neighbor if he saw theobject disappear, he told me he saw it quickly zip to the north and in the blinkof an eye the object was gone.   it could have been a weather balloon, but itdidn92t move for about 10 minutes and then it shot north very quickly which rulesout a weather balloon as far as i92m concerned.I92m not sure what i saw, but i have never seen anything like it before.
content.summary: Metallic teardrop/cone shaped obj. sited over the

content.detailedDescription: when this happend i was outside taking pictures.The first thing that made me notice it was the lights that looked like beams. ireally did not know what i thought it was. when me and my friend first saw it wenoticed that it got colder and after we noticed that night when we where asleep,we both woke up after dreaming of people watching us and stuff.     this objectlooked like a saucer that was kinda sticking out in the middle with lightsaroung it in the middle with beams and then out of the bottom a big white beam.     this object just disipeard and thats when we lost sight of it. us both havebeen reasearching and have found nothing that looks like this object.Considering we are both gonna be fbi agents when we grow up. we both truley dothink its a ufo. cause there is such things.
content.summary: Pictures from 99 got developed found 1 that looks
Possible evidence of alien creature

content.detailedDescription: as my wife was leaving for work, i was enjoyingthe exceptionally clear sky, when i saw what i first thought was a satellite.The pinpoint of light was varying in brightness (not unlike the way a satellitedoes), when it went into a rough circular path, ending in a roughly 90 degreedirection change. my wife witnessed one of the circles and direction changes. mywife left for work, and i continued to watch the object for an additional 10-15minutesduring which time the object repeated the circle26 direction change 3 more times. i lost sight of the object about 15 degreesabove the se horizon due to city lights 10 miles away and approaching dawn. i ama retired army aviator, and an avid amateur astronomer. in all my time in thesky and watching the sky, i have never seen anything like this. the size, color,perceived altitude, direction changes, and speed are inconsistent with any typeof aircraft, satellite, weather balloon, astronomical or environmental event. iwould be very interested to know if this object was observed by anyone else.
content.summary: Observed point of white light that changed directi

content.detailedDescription: I have to report to you that on tuesday night, sept 11, 2001, i and my 9 yearold son witnessed a wedge shaped ufo. i live in colon, mi. (85.19deg west,41.57deg north). the time was about 22:10 when he reported to me that he saw aplane in the sky. i went to his room to see, thinking this odd as all of theairports had been shut down. i have seen airplane lights before, they strobe a aregular, even rate and have a red light on one wing, a blue light on the otherand a white light amid-ship somewhere. what i saw was a slow moving craft with randomly flashing blue, red, and white lights all along the edge of the craft. we then ran outside to get a better view. it was moving due west from a point south east of my position. as it came parallel to our position i did a angle check by hand (a trick i learned in astronomy class) i found that it was about 30 degrees above the horizon over due south. i could not judge its distance as i realized that i was not dealing with just any standard aircraft, and these things could really be any size. i could not detect any sound coming from the craft. but, as i said, i have no idea how far the craft was from my position. as it neared the western horizon i noticed that the only steady lights on the craft were two white rear lights. one on each rear point. i dont know if there have been any other reports of the sighting, but i offer mine as more proof that this type of craft exists. my theory is that they may have been interested as to why there were no other aircraft in the air over one of the busiest air traffic continents on this planet.
content.summary: Sighting of wedge shaped object
Mysterious light over anderson indiana to the nort
Bright white blinking light

content.detailedDescription: Investigator interviewed the witness by telephone on augut 27, 2001. hestated that he and his sons fiance were sitting by the pool at about11:30 p.M. on august 10, 2001. they were looking toward the north at thenight sky from his residence on 4th street n. in st. petersburg whenthey saw a bright object, white in color, appear in the sky. moving likea skimmer bug skimming across water in a pulsing fashion. it stopped,banked at sharp angles, zigzagging right and left and immediatelychanged directions 180 degrees, then drifted. it would repeat theseactions several times during the sighting.The witness stated that the sky was fairly clear but there was somecloud cover which made it difficult to determine the exact shape of theobject, although it appeared to be spherical. the distance wasapproximately 2 miles and the elevation 5.000 feet.The witness is an ex-air force pilot and is familiar with fighterplanes. he said after about 15 minutes 4-6 fighter planes came from thedirection of macdill afb and passed by in a south to southeasterlydirection as though they were searching for something. the first passthey made was at a low altitude of about 1/3 mile above the bay directlybelow the object and the next pass was at a higher altitude. however,the object remained motionless during these periods and it escapeddetection.Later, about 14 or 15 small white/beige lights seemed to materializefrom all directions of outer space. they kept circling the large object,getting closer and closer, then all stopped and remained motionless witha little movement from time to time.After about one hour, witness returned to his apartment. he is at acomplete loss to understand what he observed because nothing in his air forcecareer remotely resembled this sighting.
content.summary: Skimmer bug sphere  and fighter planes
Two mornings in a row saw bright object move acros
Onboard a chartered sailing vessel in the british

content.detailedDescription: first abscence of normal sounds. took break fromwork to sit on porch. observed many very high speed objects from e to w. 3 to 5times faster than a satellite. next, suspicious recon plane same path e to w.Then many erratic moving objects overhead. followed by many birds and varietysat high altitude. then normal air traffic resumed. (live near airport)
content.summary: Very quick reflective objects, followed by air for
